feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: shadwstalkr/GrahamScanDemo
entry.summary:
Introduction

This is an implementation of the Graham scan algorithm for finding a convex hull in Haskell. This article follows how I developed it, missteps and all.

entry.title: dborza/haskell-musings
entry.summary:
Taking haskell for a test drive

haskell-musings

Taking haskell for a test drive

This is a project that aims to test the basic building blocks of functional programming and of the haskell programming language.

It is supposed to have some algorithm implementations and who knows, maybe a simple web app.
